scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.build:api: cd api && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:api
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:api
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:api
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:api
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:api && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd scripts && npm install && npm run setup-db
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run vercel:deploy
scripts.deploy:ci: npm ci && npm run build && npm run vercel:deploy
